definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make turbid (As. dalâḫu, disturb, Zim:Bp 81 also in deriv.; Pal. Targum [[דְּלַח]] fig. be anxious, fear, dlah. turbavit, conturbavit)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms., [[וַתִּדְלַח]] Ez Eze 32:2; 3 fs. sf. [[תִּדְלָחֵם]] Ez Eze 32:13 + v:Eze 32:13 (Co [[תרפשׂם]]);—stir up, trouble, make turbid (always with feet) sq. [[מים]] Ez Eze 32:2 (‖[[תִּרְפּׂס]],—[[ס]] Baer, and not [[שׂ]]); so Eze 32:13 a, b (but v:Eze 32:13 b. Co rds. [[תרפשׂ]] (cf. v:Eze 32:2) for [[תדלחם]]).
